Tulsa.Brady Theater: Brady Theater (formerly Tulsa Convention Hall and Tulsa Municipal Theater) is a theater and convention hall located in Tulsa, Oklahoma. It was originally completed in 1914 and remodeled in 1930 and 1952. The building was used as a detention center during the 1921 Tulsa Race Riot. It is listed on the National Register of Historic Places and remains in use as a theater today.
